title: The Trickster's Truth

panel_structure.description: Architect pulls back cosmic curtain revealing the Wizard as fractal trickster—tiny man, great head, ball of fire all simultaneously true, backstage machinery of reality exposed with gears of illusion and truth intertwined
Scene splits into three emotional states: ecstatic gold, terrifying crimson, revealing crystal, each showing same truth from different angles, the trickster dancing between all three

transformation_notes: The Wizard of Oz becomes a metaphor for how altered states work—pulling back the curtain of ordinary consciousness to reveal the trickster truth that can manifest as ecstasy, terror, or pure revelation.
